labels.analysis: The MCP Server "Kakao Map" leverages Kakao API to provide location-based place recommendations within South Korea. Its primary functionality revolves around searching and recommending nearby places, which suggests strong ties to map-based services and locality-based recommendations.
labels.reasoning: The primary functionality aligns closely with the "Travel & Maps" category due to its focus on location services and place recommendations. "Web Search & Research" could be a secondary label as it assists in discovering places, but it's less central. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories adequately cover the server's purpose.

카카오 API를 활용하여 대한민국 내 위치 기반 장소 추천을 제공하는 MCP 서버입니다.

github link 를 통해 자세한 내용을 확인 할 수 있습니다.

tools.name: kakao_map_place_recommender
tools.description: Deploy Server @cgoinglove/mcp-server-kakao-map Try in Playground kakao_map_place_recommender

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@cgoinglove/mcp-server-kakao-map/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: kakaoMapApiKey
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: The REST API key for accessing the Kakao Map (Local) API.
